info.author: David Guerizec
info.description:
The filter scripts are written in python, with a simple syntax to be able to 
acces any mail header and attribute.

It automatically creates maildirs and notify the user by mail when it does.
It only works with courier-imap for the moment, but support for other imap 
servers is planned.

It also comes with plopmonitor, a gamin compatible daemon to monitor maildirs 
and execute script when needed (useful to reclassify mails).
info.keywords: plopmail mail postfix courier-imap mda procmail maildrop
info.name: plopmail
info.summary: plopmail is a pure python MDA replacing procmail or maildrop
info.html_description:
The filter scripts are written in python, with a simple syntax to be able to acces any mail header and attribute.

It automatically creates maildirs and notify the user by mail when it does. It only works with courier-imap for the moment, but support for other imap servers is planned.

It also comes with plopmonitor, a gamin compatible daemon to monitor maildirs and execute script when needed (useful to reclassify mails).
